snippet: An interview with Branko Milanovic of the City University of New York, a longtime development expert at the World Bank, on how globalization has reduced income inequality between nations.
abstract: An interview with Branko Milanovic of the City University of New York, a longtime development expert at the World Bank, on how globalization has reduced income inequality between nations.

headline.main: Q. and A.: A Development Expert on Narrowing Inequality
